title: Ragavendra Raja
author: Ragavendra Raja
content: BitTorrent is a product firm for record capacity that was purchased in July 2018 by Tron organizer Justin Sun for $140 million. The local badge of BitTorrent is BTT which is utilized to pay for administrations. BTT was sent off through the Binance Launchpad to bring assets up in 2019.BitTorrent (BTT) Price Prediction 2022By taking a gander at the everyday diagram of BTT/USDT, the BTT cost was swinging from $0.00000094 to $0.00000092 in the wake of contacting the help levels of $0.00000088 and $0.00000086. It turned around from the help level of $0.00000086 and presently going sideways on the lookout and is supposed to be bullish before very long.In the interim, our drawn out BTT price prediction for 2022 is bullish since it can't break the current help level soon. We can anticipate that BTT should reach $0.000002 in 2022.

comments.author: Teraboy
comments.body: I thought that this token already dead but yeah no benefit by buying this token and what's next? expecting new ath to come? that doens't even make sense. In my opinion if buying this token will be a boomerang for us. BTT is not even worthy to be bought. So many people stuped enough to buy this garbage token. I didn't even think pump will happen this year but you are feeling very optimism about that.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Torrent industry is not profitable anymore because file sharing, videos and music are now convenient with a cheap subscription. The demand for this kind of services is not huge compared before when file piracy is a trend. Besides the torrent market being profitable, The Tron blockchain itself doesnâ€™t the hype which they got during there early stage. They are now starting crumble with there business since developers is already leaving for a better blockchain. Tron too much centralized already backfired to them.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on August 26, 2022, 08:56:10 AMTorrent industry is not profitable anymore because file sharing, videos and music are now convenient with a cheap subscription.Exacly. BTT is a product needed in 2010. Its 2022 right now. Torrents are not so popular right now. In fact I can bet that 90% of '00 kids doesn't even know hot to use torrents. I know that 0.00000089 looks cheap for crypto noobs but total project evaluation (marketcap) equal $1B ! For "retro technology" that barely anyone use in 2022.

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: i have never invested in this BTT coin but i have traded on binance playing on the BTT/BUSD pair and it was nice to get short term profit, but don't recommend investing in the long term when the market is still unstable and also the project seems to be dead not very well developed

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: I had invested a decent amount for buying BTT tokens. And lost almost 40% and then sold it in loses. And then they dumped more so I will never suggest to invest in that project. You can find better projects if you research by own.
